original_title: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Live - I' ll Take You There
overview: Another installment from the historic vaults of the Rock And Roll Hall of Fame. Includes exclusive performaces by U2 with Bruce Springsteen, Queen with Dave Grohl and Taylor Hawkins, The Byrds with Don Henly & Jackson Browne and many more. Also includes induction and acceptance speeches, behind-the-scenes and rehearsal footage
title: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Live - I' ll Take You There
